swen221.shapedrawer.shapes

Class CompoundShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • swen221.shapedrawer.shapes.CompoundShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Shape

    public class CompoundShape
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shape
    This class is an implementation class of Shape interface Responsible for getting a compound shape from two input shape expressions with one of three operators (+,& and -) which corresponding to shape union, shape intersection, and shape difference respectively. 
     Notice:
 All of three different operators are created as static variables.
 So, a OperatorShape abstract class is not needed.
    Author:
    Minping
